activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ethan E Bakalars

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on November 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:55 AM Defendant Ethan E Bakalars appeared by video.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  This covers cases 22CF86 & 2TR431.  Court relates counsel has not yet been appointed.  AIA set in both cases for 11/9/2022 at 10:00 AM.  DE may appear by Zoom Video to next hearing.  Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report
Adjourned initial appearance on September 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:41 AM Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ethan E Bakalars appeared by video. This covers cases 22CF86 & 22TR431.  DE qualifies for PD representation, however counsel has not yet been applied. DE relates regarding substitution of Judge.  Clerk to mail NOH to DE with Zoom instructions.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
OSPD Appointment of Counsel Report - No attorney appointed
Adjourned initial appearance on August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:49 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ethan E Bakalars in court. 
COVERS 22CF86 & 22TR431.
Court relates that the public defender has not found counsel yet.  Defendant relates.  AIA set and may appear by Zoom video and citation to track.  Bond continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 17, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

10;05 A.M. Defendant Ethan E Bakalars in court.  Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.   Attorney Michael J Steuer appeared by video for Ethan E Bakalars for today only.
COVERS 22CF86 (AIA), 22TR431 (INTAKE) & 22TR435 (INTAKE/REFUSAL).
21TR435 was defaulted by Court earlier, found unreasonable, imposed $50.00 surcharge, ordered 12 months DL Rev and 12 months IID, but relates since Defendant appears now they will recall that case.
Attorney Steuer relates Defendant needs to call to see if he qualifies.  Defendant relates he would like to go forward without an attorney.  10;07 a.m. Defendant sworn.  Court questions defendant on waiver of counsel.    The Court does not find waiver intelligently and voluntarily given.  Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney.  Case to be recalled. 10:45 a.m. case recalled and qualifies for public defender. 22CF86 and 22TR431 are set to June 29, 2022 at 10:00 a.m.  Court relates on 22TR435, found unreasonable, imposed $50.00 surcharge, 12 months DL Revocation and 12 months IID.  Reminder note given to Defendant in court.
Hearing scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

Must not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.
Must not possess controlled substances except those medications that are prescribed to his clients and administered consistent with his employment.
Must not consume controlled substances.

1:22 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ethan E Bakalars appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Andrew T Knaak appeared by video for Ethan E Bakalars.
Defendant needs to contact the Public Defender's office before leaving jail today. Jail to provide blue form to Defendant if he does not qualify for Public Defender. State relates and requests signature bond. Attorney Knaak relates. Next hearing to be in person.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 10:00 am.
